job.title: Software Engineer - Data Solutions RWF
job.description:
Job Description
Important Note: During the application process, ensure your contact information (email and phone number) is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration. To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation. The invitation can be sent by both email and text message. In order to receive text message invitations, your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as “Personal Cell” or “Cellular” in the contact information of your application.
At Wells Fargo, we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity, equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspired.
Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you.
Technology sets IT strategy; enhances the design, development, and operations of our systems; optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure; provides information security; and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day, 7 days a week banking access through in-branch, online, ATMs, and other channels.
Our mission is to deliver stable, secure, scalable, and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employees.
This position will support the Customer Excellence enterprise function formed in 2019 which enables a holistic view of critical customer interaction points and partners across lines of business to strengthen the experiences we provide to our customers. Specifically, this group will identify and implement enhancements defined by the Customer Remediation Center of Excellence business group and constantly look for solutions to improve application performance, stability and availability of end to end solution. This is a mission critical function that will move the needle on supporting our customers and team members, meet the expectations of our regulators, and continue to transform the company.
This role is a Senior role, within the Customer Remediation Technology team, responsible for:
Application Design
Participates in application design by providing feedback and guidance on available technology options to business problems specific to sanctions screening
Provides high-level estimates for different alternative designs to help guide functional design
Architecture / High Level Design
Analyzes complex business requirements, designs and writes architecture and technical specifications to design computer applications
Leads application detail design, providing guidance and consultation to other members of the development team
Analyzes requirements specific to the technical needs of the highly available, high volume, real-time transactional processing system
Construction
Develops highly complex original code
Provides technical assistance to less experienced staff
Verifies program logic by: Reviewing detailed design prepared by other members of the technical staff and Participating in code walkthroughs
Deployment
Ensure any modified or new components are well-documented so that the deployment team can deploy efficiently
Other Requirements
Participates in process refinement for the entire software development life cycle
Assures quality, security and compliance requirements are met
RWF - Please note that "RWF" is an identifier for internal recruiting purposes only and has no connection to the nature or responsibilities of the job.
Required Qualifications
5+ years of software engineering experience
5+ years of Java experience
3+ years of relational database experience
3+ years of data analysis experience
2 + years of experience with Agile tools
Desired Qualifications
An industry-standard technology certification
Strong verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
A BS/BA degree or higher in information technology
Good verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
1+ year of Tableau experience
Ability to be proactive, innovative and creative in meeting customer and enterprise needs
4+ years of ETL, data warehouse and data analytics delivery experience on internal or external cloud platforms
4 + years of experience supporting or designing complex ETL production environments
4+ years of GitHub experience
Big Data experience
Job Expectations
Flexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a day
Ability to work additional hours as needed
Ability to travel up to 10% of the time
Street Address
AZ-Chandler:
2600 S Price Rd - Chandler, AZ
NJ-Summit:
190 River Rd - Summit, NJ
CA-SF-Financial District:
550 California St - San Francisco, CA
Disclaimer
All offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check. Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local, state and Federal law, including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.
Relevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and women.
Wells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer, Minority/Female/Disabled/Veteran/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation.
Benefits
Benefits Summary
Visit https://www.wellsfargo.com/about/careers/benefits for benefits information.
Reference Number
